subject_terms_3: Textile art and design Indian costumes
physical_appearance: This is a long piece of cloth used as a turban. It features a horizontal striped design, with diamond scrolls presented in multiple colours. The ends of the cloth on the right are left unhemmed and frayed. The left end of the cloth is laid out, while the rest of the length of the fabric is collected on the right.
sgcool_label_text: Handwoven turban cloth, used by the Meghwal, Ahir or Rabari communities of Gujarat and Rajasthan
subject_terms_2: Textile fabrics Motifs Turbans Ethnic costume Rabaris Dhangar (South Asian people)
